vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀντίπας (T, Ἀντείπας), -α (in some MSS. it appears to be indecl.; but see M, Pro.12:1-28; it is abbrev. from Ἀντίπατρος), ὁ,
Antipas: Rev.2:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rev.2.13
§ Antipas, (Proper name), Rev. 2:13*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
安提帕 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "像父親一樣"
別迦摩的一名殉道信徒(啟 2:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
安提帕 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "像父亲一样"
别迦摩的一名殉道信徒(启 2:13)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: An-ti-ba hoặc An-ti-pa, ông này là chứng nhân trung thành của ĐCT
